entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -23.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 12:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -23.4°C
Pressure: 103.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -27.0°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
